label: MERN STACK DEVELOPER
description: JWT Token Management: Implemented secure JWT token management, leveraging React-Hook.
REST API Development: Designed and developed robust RESTful APIs using Node.js, ensuring efficient and scalable server-side logic.
Client Collaboration: Collaborated closely with clients, utilizing tools like Figma, XD, PS, and Invasion to translate requirements into system designs.

State Management Expertise: Utilized Middleware, Redux Toolkit, Redux-Saga, Context API, and Redux-Thunk to seamlessly retrieve and store data from the Backend, along with performing RESTFUL services.

Responsive Styling: Applied CSS Box Model, employed styled components, CSS preprocessor SASS, and effectively used mixins, functions, grid-area concepts, and flexbox for creating fluid-responsive applications.
Server Configuration (Digital Ocean): Configured servers on Digital Ocean, implementing server-side optimizations and security measures to ensure reliable and performant application hosting.
Version Control and Testing: Employed Git-based version control systems (Github, Bitbucket, GitLab) for collaborative development.

label: JAVASCRIPT DEVELOPER
description: Client Collaboration: Worked closely with clients to establish detailed specifications and system designs, utilizing tools like Figma, Adobe XD, Photoshop, and InVision for effective UX collaboration.

Responsive Web Design: Implemented advanced CSS techniques, including the CSS Box Model, styled-components, and CSS preprocessor SASS. Effectively used mixins, functions, grid-area concepts, and flexbox to create fluid and responsive web applications.
Team Collaboration: Worked closely with cross-functional teams, including designers and senior developers, to ensure project goals were met and delivered on time.
Version Control: Used GitHub for version control and tracking, facilitating collaborative development and maintaining code quality.

label: Web DEVELOPER
description: WordPress Customization: Customized WordPress themes and plugins to meet specific client needs, enhancing website functionality, performance, and user engagement.

React.js Development: Implemented innovative website solutions as a React.js developer, building reusable components with styled-components for improved cross-platform optimization and site performance.
Responsive Design: Applied advanced CSS techniques, including the CSS Box Model, flexbox, and grid systems, to create responsive and visually appealing websites.
Client Collaboration: Worked closely with clients and senior developers to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications, ensuring timely and accurate project delivery.
